page.title: 14TOURISM
page.content: CAMPS THEY DO ALLOW PETS IN.THE LAND COVER IS ABOUT 9\ ACRES. THE STABLE HANDS HAVE TO GROOM THE HORSES, CLEAN THE STABLES AND ESCORT RIDERS. THEY HAVE 11 HORSES AND 3 PEOPLE WHO WORK ROUND THE STABLES AND IF ONE IS OFF SICK THEY DO NOT HAVE ANYONE TO REPLACE THEM SO THE OTHER 2 HAVE TO WORK EXTRA HARD AND AT THE MOMENT THEY HAVE A LOW SUPPLY OF HAY. MOSTLY IN THE EVENINGS THEY HAVE DISCOS.THEY DO NOT HAVE ANY FULL-TIME PEOPLE WORKING IN THE DISCO SO THEY DO NOT HAVE ANYTHING TO WORRY ABOUT WHEN THEY ARE CLOSED FOR THE WINTER.THEY HAVE ONLY EVER HAD 2 DISASTERS- FLOODING & WIND. PEOPLE WHO STAY THERE CAN BRING THEIR OWN CARAVANS IF THEY WANT TO.THEY HAVE ONLY HAD TO CALL THE POLICE IN CASES OF LOST CHILDREN AND ACCIDENTS.THEY HAVE NOT HAD ANY VANDALISM YET.
